sense.name: increase threefold
sense.examples: Ownership of digital music players has more than tripled from 2005 to 2006. Bird flu fatalities have almost tripled this year. The number of bacteria in a certain culture triples every 2 hours.

sense.name: hit a three-base hit
sense.examples: Pitcher allows no hits through 9 innings, but triples every time up. Justin Solomon singled twice and tripled for the Rockies.
